Privacy Policy

Biblical Heritage does not collect, store, transmit, or share any personal data through its applications.

The Bible Readings 1914 app does not require user accounts, does not track users, and does not use analytics, advertising identifiers, cookies, or third‑party tracking technologies.

All content is available offline after installation. Any subscriptions or purchases are processed entirely by Apple through the App Store. Biblical Heritage does not receive or store payment information.

If you have questions regarding privacy, you may contact us at: OurBiblicalHeritage@gmail.com
